TEXT.S:
satangahan
u zuma a kamu u kamu nu Hulam: u kamu nu Amilika:salty u kamu nu Zipun:
tinaku a kamu ahecid ahecid ku nisalami' niza tatayna. ahcid tinacen ku kabi mitaneng tu ahcid! ! aheciday aheciday ku heci nu lebus. ahecidenaheciden kaku tu silaw. saaheciday saaheciday ku silaw ni Sayun. Sayun siahecid siahecid ku heci nu lebus.
